view.status: You rip open the rat's guts, dining on the delicious organs within. You need a bit of care to avoid getting a bunch of fur stuck in your teeth, but not so much as to truly slow you down.

up.preview: It looks like pretty open space up there, near the large, arching roof of the cavern. Plenty of space to fly.

north.preview: You can see your mother's skeletal spine arching far over the ground over there, an easy landmark to spot, even at a distance.

east.preview: Your mother's ribs arch down through the area over there, massive columns visible from a distance.

west.preview: It looks like an unremarkable area in the middle of the cavern. You don't really see much of anything for some distance.

south.preview: It looks like an unremarkable area in the middle of the cavern. You don't really see much of anything for some distance.

controls.help: Search the area for prey to kill, or whatever, initiating a combat.

lines.help:
Health.
When your health drops to zero, you will be force to rewind to your last rest point. Over time, nutrition converts to stamina and then to health.

Stamina.
When your stamina drops to zero, you will need to digest food to recover. Some actions spend stamina, and also it converts to health over time.

Nutrition.
Eat food to fill up so you can recover and heal.

Mana.
The mystical energy that wells up within you over time.
